did.unittitle: W. Lloyd Wright collection of photographs
did.abstract: This collection of photographs is housed at the Luther Brady Gallery. Please see staff for assistance.

prefercite.head: Preferred citation
prefercite.p: W. Lloyd Wright collection of photographs, Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Some material may be copyrighted or restricted. It is the patron's obligation to determine and satisfy copyright or other case restrictions when publishing or otherwise distributing materials found in the collections.

scopecontent.head: Collection Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection is housed at the Luther Brady Gallery. Please see staff for assistance.

Use the guide "W. Lloyd Wright Collection of Photographs [SPEC N 4030 .G4 W7 REF]. Staff need to contact the Luther Brady Gallery and make arrangements for the patrons to visit and use the collection at that location.

odd.head: Collection note
odd.p: Use the guide W. Lloyd Wright Collection of Photographs [SPEC N 4030 .G4 W7 REF]. Staff need to contact the Luther Brady Gallery and make arrangements for the patrons to visit and use the collection at that location."
